name.ja: <ruby>鉄獣の咆哮<rt>トライブリゲード・ロアー</rt></ruby>

text.en:
If you control a Link Monster: Send 1 "Tri-Brigade" card from your Deck or Extra Deck to the GY, then target 1 Effect Monster on the field; apply this effect based on the type of card sent.
● Monster: Change the targeted monster's ATK to 0 until the end of this turn.
● Spell: Negate the targeted monster's effects until the end of this turn.
● Trap: Return the targeted monster to the hand.
You can only activate 1 "Tri-Brigade Roar" per turn.
